description: My personal configuration for Unix based systems, this is not a big project for most people but is the one I work on the most.

My brothers website, he is a lovely and I forgot to buy him a christmas gift so I spent the morning of christmas eve making him this. It is pretty poorly made but he seemed to like it.

My personal 'home page' or the tab that opens up when I open up a new time. I switch between qutebrowser, firefox and brave but this always stays with me. It is very useful especially with vimium so I don't have to type into a searchbar. I am a programmer I am hardwiring to be lazy.
